name: GlobePilot AI Agent 2
description: AI-powered global travel assistant providing visa info, airport status, events, culture, food, and practical travel insights.
author: Teneo Builder

commands.name: visa_info
commands.description: Check visa requirements based on nationality and destination

commands.name: convert_currency
commands.description: Convert currency with estimated real-time rates

commands.name: airport_status
commands.description: Get live airport weather and recent departure status

commands.name: events_in
commands.description: Discover events and festivals in a city

commands.name: cultural_tips
commands.description: Learn cultural etiquette and do's & don'ts

commands.name: emergency_info
commands.description: Get emergency numbers and traveler safety info

commands.name: best_time_to_visit
commands.description: Find the best season to visit a destination

commands.name: hidden_gems
commands.description: Discover local hidden gems and non-touristy spots

commands.name: food_recommend
commands.description: Explore local food and must-try dishes
